idinfo.useconst: There are no restrictions or legal prerequisites required for using the data. The Department asks that any use of the data for publication be accompanied by proper citation.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: The method the trail data was collected.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.
Feature geometry.
Trail Name. Local name of the trail.
Regional Trail Name. If a trail is part of a larger trail network, enter the larger trail network name here.
Other trail name. If a trail is part of two larger trail networks, enter the 2nd trail network name here.
The point where the trail segment originates.
The point at where the trail segment terminates
List the county in which the trail is found.
Status of the trail segment
Indicates if hiking is permissible on the trail.
Indicates if biking is permissible on the trail.
Indicates if equestrian use is permissible on the trail.
Indicates if ATV riding is permissible on the trail.
Indicates if snowmobiling is permissible on the trail.
Is this segment on a road, trail, or both.
Indicates whether or not the trail is located on a former rail corridor.
Indicates the type of trail system on this particular trail segment.
Indicates if the trail segment is ADA accessible?
Managing Entity. Primary organization/agency responsible for the trail.
Address for the managing entity.
City where the managing entity's offices are located.
State in which the managing entity's offices are located.
Zip Code for the managing entity's offices.
Date the trail was last updated in the trails database.
Additional comments regarding the data entered into the trails database.

dataqual.complete: The Commonwealth of Pennsylvania makes no guarantee or warranty concerning the accuracy or completeness of the information contained in this geographic dara or any accompanying documentation.
